example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS وعد) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يظل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC متنبهاً) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN اي) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اشارة) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN تغيير)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سلوك) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الفلسطينيين)))))))))))))

arg.g: for any sign of change in the behavior of the Palestinians

example.arg: لاي اشارة تغيير في سلوك الفلسطينيين
